abstract: Dominique Browning reviews gardening books Garden Revolution by Larry Weaner and Thomas Christopher; Roberto Burle Marx: Brazilian Modernist by Jens Hoffmann and Claudia J Nahson, The Rooftop Growing Guide by Annie Novak, The Culinary Herbal by Susan Belsinger and Arthur O Tucker, Carnivorous Plants by Nigel Hewitt-Cooper, Styling Nature by Lewis Miller, The Flower Workshop by Ariella Chezar, What Have Plants Ever Done For Us by Stephen Harris, A Wilder Life by Celestine Maddy and What is a Garden? by W S Merwin.
lead_paragraph: New books about gardens include the work of the great Brazilian landscape architect Roberto Burle Marx, a tour of the Hawaiian garden of the poet W.S. Merwin and more.

headline.main: Gardens: ‘The Rooftop Growing Guide,’ and More

snippet: New books about gardens include the work of the great Brazilian landscape architect Roberto Burle Marx, a tour of the Hawaiian garden of the poet W.S. Merwin and more.
